title: KCSO investigating shooting in Lamont
content:
LAMONT, Calif.
Kern County deputies are investigating a shooting Friday afternoon in Lamont. Sheriff's officials say it took place in the area of Hall Road and Velma Avenue around 4:45 p.m. Velma Avenue is closed as deputies continue their investigation.
17 News has a photographer on the scene and we hope to bring you more information as it becomes available.
